app.name: SaveGame Manager GX
app.long_description:
A Savegame/Mii extractor and installer for the Wii by Dj_Skual.
Features: * SDHC, USB2 and GC MemoryCard support (hot-plug) * USB support FAT, NTFS and EXT2FS * Official saves support (data.bin) * Protected saves support * GameCube saves support (.gci) * GameCube memory cards support (extract/restore .raw/.mci/.gcp images) * GameCube memory cards raw images support (manage saves like in real card) * GameCube memory cards raw images creation and resize * Emulated Nand support (3 slots available) * Miis Support (with face display and unlock not editable miis) * Multilanguage support * Custom Font support * Themes support (direct download on www.spiffy360.com) * GameTDB support * Display informations about Savegames/Data.bin in a special window (Name, Subname, ID, BlockSize, Icon) * Display informations about Miis in a special window (Name, Creator, Date, Gender, Favorite Color) * Extract, Install, Delete, Copy, Move fonctions are available * Custom Background Music support (AIF/MP3/OGG/BNS/WAV) * WiiMote, Classic, GameCube support * WiiU Pro Controllers support (on vWii) * WiiU GamePad Controller support when booted from a WiiU WiiVC * Online AutoUpdate * Homebrew Browser * Channel Browser * ScreenSaver * Screenshots
Credits: Coding: Dj_Skual, Giantpune Artworks: Neorame, Cyrex, Dj_Skual Languages: Dj Skual and Translaters
